about.title: About Guatemala's History
about.description: Guatemala has a rich history, with ancient Mayan civilizations, Spanish colonization, and a history of civil conflict and resilience.

events.event: The height of the Maya civilization, with major cities like Tikal flourishing.
The Spanish conquest of Guatemala begins, led by Pedro de Alvarado.
Guatemala declares independence from Spain as part of the United Provinces of Central America.
